samples.question: And what are the reasons people choose to travel and explore new places?
samples.transcript: Well, clearly it can be because they want to reduce their stress in their life and their everyday work and their everyday routine. And, I would say probably it can be very, like, like helpful for your own body. You can spend your time with your friends and with your family and that can be really helpful.

samples.question: And, what are the most essential items to carry on a journey?
samples.transcript: As of the more, like I would say in the modern era, a phone and an electric device like laptop can be really necessary. And we could say if, if you are going to stay in a, in a, like if you want to take a long journey, And if you want to sleep in the, for example, jungles, it would be better to take a huge backpack and take, pillows and tents and it can be really, helpful for you in there but, and some clothes can be helpful too. They can really, be good and I would say lots of other things. Alright, thank you very much.

samples.question: Would you please start?
samples.transcript: Okay. A special occasion I remember when I forgot something important was the train ticket. I remember last month I was attending a family program. So I have to go to the railway station to, in a train. but I, I just found that I did not bring my, I did not bring my ticket. So, I, in most of the time I buy ticket from online. But, in that time I remember, when I, went to the, railway station, I, the, I have to buy ticket. and, I, I, I, and I keep it in my home. But I, when, but in, when the, I was about to get on the train, I forgot to bring it. And, that time I just found that, I did not bring ticket and it would be very tough to, go without ticket in a train. So, I, then, I got, in my, I, I went to my home and get the ticket and inform the railway station manager that of about this incident And yes this experience it was very exciting and I learned a lot that someone might forgot things which can bring problem in the future Okay, thank you very much.

samples.question: Why do people want to remember their family history?
samples.transcript: There are some certain reasons. for instance, they can know about their background more well and they can know about their characteristics. And, some people have a fascination to know more deeply about their ancestors. And this had a great influence on them. and they do various types of research about them. And these are the reasons why people want to know about their ancestors.

samples.question: And what can you do to learn more about your family history?
samples.transcript: Well, I can do a couple of things. Firstly, I would talk to my grandfather about his ancestors and get and collect lots of information. Besides, I can talk to my relatives about their whereabouts where they used to live. And, I can collect information about, their background, in which region they would stay. And by doing these researches, and I think, in this way I can know about more about my family history. Thank you, Tansir, for your time.

samples.question: What do you enjoy about your work or your studies?
samples.transcript: Yes, that is a really, emotional question. As you know, because the reason I want to be a teacher is that I love the moment and, And the opportunity to meet new students, the new people and teach them. And I believe that when I give a new knowledge and I see in their eyes, they understand the problem and they become better in one day. So that is my passion and that is the reason why. Actually, I do not, I think that in order to say that I love these jobs because I do not have enough evidence for that. However, I believe that in the future when I am really old and I look at the time when I teach my students, that I overcome a lot of difficulties that I have in my life. I can say that I love these jobs.
